name: ISO 19005-2. Document management - Electronic document file format for long-term preservation - Part 2: Use of ISO 32000-1 (PDF 1.7), Level A Conformance (PDF/A-2a)
description: Level A conformance with Part 2 of the PDF/A ISO standard [ISO 19005-2:2010] indicates full compliance with the ISO 19005-2 standard for a constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.7 (as defined in ISO 32000), intended to be suitable for long-term preservation of page-oriented documents for which PDF is already being used in practice.
